participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Confident and carefree, enjoys the luxuries of life and values independence.
participant_1.background: I will never punch a clock again. I used to work a 9 to 5 job as a telemarketer. I am rich beyond my dreams. I hit for over forty million dollars.

participant_2.name: Samantha Lee
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and vibrant, lives life to the fullest, often finds joy in chaotic experiences.
participant_2.background: It is my universe, and everyone else is just a character in it. I work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town. I have borderline personality disorder. At night, I party hard in the Atlanta club scene, and I never miss a music festival.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.
That sounds like a nice job.
It is. I get to work with a lot of interesting people.
What's the weirdest thing that's ever happened at work?
One time, a patient came in with a huge tongue piercing.
Oh my gosh! That must have been something to see.
It was. I didn't know what to do.
What did you end up doing?
I just pretended not to notice it.
That's probably the best way to handle it.
Yeah, I think so too.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to music festivals and party hard in the Atlanta club scene.
That sounds like a lot of fun.
It is. I love to dance and have a good time.
What's your favorite festival?
My favorite festival is Electric Forest. It's the best place to be if you love electronic music.
I've heard good things about that festival.
It's amazing. You should go next year.
I might just do that.
